content.query:
USE daiEdw;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE CLEAN_TRAINING_SET
(
	breadth VARCHAR(255),
	course VARCHAR(255),
	draft VARCHAR(255),
	dwt VARCHAR(255),
	heading VARCHAR(255),
	iceclass VARCHAR(255),
	id VARCHAR(255),
	lat VARCHAR(255),
	lon VARCHAR(255),
	mmsi VARCHAR(255),
	power VARCHAR(255),
	speed VARCHAR(255),
	timestamp VARCHAR(255),
	turnrate VARCHAR(255),
	vessel_max_speed VARCHAR(255),
	vessel_type VARCHAR(255),
    dq_check INT
)
WITH(
LOCATION = 'TRAINING_SET_JSON/',
DATA_SOURCE = CleanDeltaLakeStorage,
FILE_FORMAT = CleanDeltaLakeFormat
);

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM CLEAN_TRAINING_SET;

SELECT DISTINCT DQ_CHECK FROM CLEAN_TRAINING_SET;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLEAN_TRAINING_SET;
